participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Ethan enjoys trying new things and values his relationships with friends and family.
participant_1.background: I grew up with my family and learned to love them. I dream of winning the lottery. I work as a lifeguard during summer and help out at my family's restaurant during the off season. I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends. My first organic purchase was a locally grown banana for my girlfriend.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and creative, Samantha finds joy in the little things, especially when spending time with her daughter.
participant_2.background: I love listening to acoustic music, especially when I am with my daughter. My nickname is bubblegum. I am not the fittest person, but I run to stay healthy for my baby. I like to pickle eggs. I want to drive my truck to the mountains and get some alone time.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Not much, just chilling. What about you?
I'm watching a movie. What's your favorite type of music?
I like acoustic music, especially when I'm with my daughter.
That's nice. I'm more into electronic music.
What's your favorite electronic song?
I don't really have a favorite, but I like Flume a lot.
I've never heard of them.
You should check them out! They're really good.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What do you do for a living?
I'm a stay-at-home mom.
That must be really hard.
It is, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is. Do you have any other kids?
Just one daughter.
That's nice. I'm an only child.
Me too.
Do you like being an only child?
It has its pros and cons.
Like what?
Pros: I get all the attention. Cons: I don't have anyone to play with.
I can see that
